name: AeroLost
description: AeroLost is an 2D game that simulates the lost and found department of an airport. Your task as an attendant is to verify all documents of those who need your help, and then ensure that each person gets your belonged item. Besides that you will also need to ensure to follow the protocol of the aiport company for lost and found items. This game is heavily inspired on the game Papers Please from developed by Lucas Pope and The Escapists by Mouldy Toof Studios.
